name: Via Serpentis Aruba - alpha demo V.8.0
name_original: Via Serpentis Aruba - alpha demo V.8.0
description:
Via Serpentis - alpha demo -compatible with mobile and desktop.

This is an educational hidden object game that I am currently developing. Here you will learn all about the snake species that inhabit Aruba, while you make a short 2D expedition through the country. Each of the species in the game emulates their real-world range and abundance rate,also they will be in a different location everytime time you play, so each expedition will be different. Also you will find valuable facts about their biology, expressed in simple terms, carefully supported by scientific articles, field studies and books.

Please, leave your comments and suggestions, this game is still under development. 

Don't  forget to share.
